class Board:
def __init__(self, apples, snakes):
self.apples = apples
self.snakes = snakes
def render(self):
self.grid = [["."] * 10 for _ in range(10)]
for a in self.apples:
self.grid[a[1]][a[0]] = "A"
for s in self.snakes:
for b in s.body:
self.grid[b[1]][b[0]] = str(s.id)
self.grid[s.head[1]][s.head[0]] = str(s.id) + " " + str(s.len)
print("\n".join([" ".join(row) for row in self.grid]))

*Example usage: *
b = Board(apples, snakes)
b.render()
